issue.title: Improve the Encryption library

repository.name: CodeIgniter
repository.description: Open Source PHP Framework (originally from EllisLab)

issue.body:
Changes include:
- Method & property visibility declarations (related to #803)
- Minor speed optimizations
- Cleaned up some comments and unnecessary code
- Fixed a typo that could cause a fatal error if neither `sha1()` or `mhash()` are available

NOTE:

I intend to do this for each of the libraries (and probably other stuff as well) separately as none of my similar pull requests that have changes to multiple classes have been accepted - I hope those make it.
With that in mind - I'll just add one line under general changes in the change log when it's all done, to avoid multiple entries with the same description and only the class name changed.

issue.title: Improve the Cart library

repository.name: CodeIgniter
repository.description: Open Source PHP Framework (originally from EllisLab)

issue.body:
Changes include:
- Method & property visibility declarations (related to #803)
- Minor speed optimizations
- Cleaned up some comments and unnecessary code
- Fixed a typo/bug that causes `contents()` to fail if called without a parameter (or an equal to FALSE one)

NOTE:

I intend to do this for each of the libraries (and probably other stuff as well) separately as none of my similar pull requests that have changes to multiple classes have been accepted - I hope those make it.
With that in mind - I'll just add one line under general changes in the change log when it's all done, to avoid multiple entries with the same description and only the class name changed.

I just saw that the Cart library will either be deprecated or replaced, but had already made the changes, so ... submitting just in case it stays.

body: var is being systematically removed as we go, narfbg is nailing this so far and other engineers will be helping out. This can be considered closed, thanks for nudging us to get on with this :)
